EntitySets.Name: Items
EntitySets.Description: Collection of learning items for administrative search operations

Properties.Name: itemID
Properties.Description: Unique identifier for the learning item

Properties.Name: duration
Properties.Description: Duration of the learning item in hours

Properties.Name: createdDate
Properties.Description: Date when the learning item was created

Properties.Name: lastModifiedDate
Properties.Description: Date when the learning item was last modified

Properties.Name: completionDate
Properties.Description: Completion date in Unix Epoch format

Properties.Name: completedHours
Properties.Description: Amount of hours completed for the curriculum requirement

Properties.Name: displayOrder
Properties.Description: Order that users progress through the learning items within a curriculum

Properties.Name: globalDisplayOrder
Properties.Description: Order that this learning object is displayed in, globally, in the curriculum
